pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, March 9, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, March 9, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

11:20 a.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Houston, United States of America.

Canada Reception Centre (Hangar 11)
Macdonald-Cartier International Airport
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for departure
  • Media wishing to cover the photo opportunity should arrive no later than 10:00 a.m.

Houston, United States of America

2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Houston, United States of America.

Ellington Airport
Houston, Texas
United States of America

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Chairman of CERAWeek, Daniel Yergin.

Closed to media

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion on the future of energy

Hilton Americas Hotel
Houston, Texas
United States of America

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only

7:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend and deliver remarks at the CERAWeek Global Energy and Environment Leadership Award Dinner and will participate in a Q&A.

Hilton Americas Hotel
Houston, Texas
United States of America

Note for media:

  • Open coverage of Prime Minister’s remarks and Q&A, expected at 8:15 p.m.

9:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will be presented the “Key to the City” by the Mayor of the City of Houston, Mr. Sylvester Turner.

Hilton Americas Hotel
Houston, Texas
United States of America

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only

Note: all times local
